Class com.jconfig.VersionNumber 
java.lang.Object
   |
   +----com.jconfig.VersionNumber

  Summary 

public class  VersionNumber
     extends java.lang.Object
{
          // Fields 6
     private int buildNumber;
     private static final String copyrightString;
     private int majorVersion;
     private int minorVersion;
     private int revisionStage;
     private String versionString;

          // Constructors 1
     public VersionNumber(String);

          // Methods 7
     public int getBuildNumber();
     public int getMajorVersion();
     public int getMinorVersion();
     private String getNextNumber(String, int[]);
     public int getRevisionStage();
     public String getVersionString();
     public String toString();
}

Parses a string in the form "majorVersion?minorVersion?revisionStage?buildNumber", where 'majorVersion', etc. are numbers, and the '?' represent non-numeric characters. Unspecified numbers will be zero.
E.g., "1.0.2" results in majorVersion=1, minorVersion=0, revisionStage=2, and buildNumber=0.

Author:
Copyright (c) 1997-2002 Samizdat Productions. All Rights Reserved.
